message: Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm offering you a good deal considering the inflation. This is a one-time offer.
You had your chance, now it's my turn. Think about the inflation!
Okay Alice, I'm compromising. This is a fair deal considering we both lose out if we wait any longer.
You're getting closer, but I'm not backing down yet. Inflation is a real concern!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm accepting your original offer to end this before the money is worthless. Don't get greedy!
